page.title: 10FASHION IN CASTLEFORD
page.content: {Mens fashion.}SHIRTS.latest colours:pink,lemon and mint.Most shirts are loose fitting with short narrow collars.JACKETS:Latest colours:white,grey,black,lemon and pink.Style:mostly short with long narrow collars.TROUSERS.The best sellers are those with tucks in the front,narrow at the bottom and are blue or grey. {Womens fashion.}DRESSES are any length with a drop waist. The colours are pastel and floral patterns. The style is crinkled with big padded sleeves. SHORTS come to the top of the leg instead of being just above the knee. TOPS are cotton,very baggy with floral patterns with three-quarter,cap or fold up sleeves and fasten at the front. SKIRTS are mini,knee length,or ankle length. The fashionable material is cotton.The latest colour is white.
